text: I prerekalsya s nim yego narod. (Togda) skazal on: "Vy prerekayetes' so mnoyu ob Allakhe, Togda kak vyvel On menya na put' pryamoy. I ne boyus' ya tekh, kogo vy pridayete v sotovarishchi Yemu, Yesli togo ne pozhelayet moy Gospod'. Ved' bezgranichnym veden'yem Svoim Gospod' moy vsyaku veshch' ob"yemlet. Uzhel' ne porazmyslit' vam nad etim
